meta.name: description

u.strong: Due to the ongoing COVID-19 situation, we are postponing our Summer Rec registration at this time. We will do our best to let everyone know once things have changed and we know what we can and are able to offer. We appreciate your patience during this time.

span.span:
Osakis Public School
Distance Learning Site

District Policies and Procedures
Last Update: April 23, 2020
To engage and support all students in building a solid foundation of knowledge, skills, and character.
